Package lifeform

Class LifeForm

  • java.lang.Object
    • lifeform.LifeForm
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Alien, Human
    public abstract class LifeForm
extends java.lang.Object
    Keeps track of the information associated with a simple life form. Also provides the functionality related to the life form.

    This is now an abstract class.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected int attackStrength  
      protected int currentLifePoints  
      protected Weapon weapon  

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      LifeForm​(java.lang.String name, int points)
      Create an instance with default attack strength of 1
      LifeForm​(java.lang.String name, int points, int attack)
      Create an instance

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void attack​(LifeForm opponent, int distance)
      attack another Lifeform with full attack strength if the attacker has a weapon with ammo, the weapon will be used if the attacker has no weapon or the weapon is out of ammo, the ranged touch attack (hand to hand attack strength) will be used ranged touch attack will only work within a distance less than or equal to 5 weapon attacks will work only within the range of the weapon used
      Weapon dropWeapon()
      drops this LifeForm's Weapon and returns it to the caller
      int getAttackStrength()  
      int getCurrentLifePoints()  
      java.lang.String getName()  
      boolean hasWeapon()  
      boolean pickUpWeapon​(Weapon weapon)
      If this LifeForm does not already hold a weapon, it will take possession of this one
      void takeHit​(int damage)
      The LifeForm's lifepoints are reduced by the damage A LifeForm cannot have life points less than zero.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • LifeForm

        public LifeForm​(java.lang.String name,
                int points)
        Create an instance with default attack strength of 1
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the life form
        points - the current starting life points of the life form.

      • LifeForm

        public LifeForm​(java.lang.String name,
                int points,
                int attack)
        Create an instance
        Parameters:
        name -
        points - the life points
        attack - the attack strength

    • Method Detail

      • takeHit

        public void takeHit​(int damage)
        The LifeForm's lifepoints are reduced by the damage A LifeForm cannot have life points less than zero. If the damage is greater than the remaining lifepoint, the LifeForm's lifepoints will be zero.
        Parameters:
        damage -

      • attack

        public void attack​(LifeForm opponent,
                   int distance)
        attack another Lifeform with full attack strength if the attacker has a weapon with ammo, the weapon will be used if the attacker has no weapon or the weapon is out of ammo, the ranged touch attack (hand to hand attack strength) will be used ranged touch attack will only work within a distance less than or equal to 5 weapon attacks will work only within the range of the weapon used
        Parameters:
        opponent -
        distance - the distance between two LifeForms

      • pickUpWeapon

        public boolean pickUpWeapon​(Weapon weapon)
        If this LifeForm does not already hold a weapon, it will take possession of this one
        Parameters:
        weapon -
        Returns:
        true if the weapon was acquired

      • dropWeapon

        public Weapon dropWeapon()
        drops this LifeForm's Weapon and returns it to the caller
        Returns:
        the Weapon this lifeform was holding

        public boolean hasWeapon()
        Returns:

      • getName

        the name of the life form.

      • getCurrentLifePoints

        public int getCurrentLifePoints()
        Returns:
        the amount of current life points the life form has.

      • getAttackStrength

        public int getAttackStrength()
        Returns:
        this LifeForm's attack strength
